snippet.title: Man dies in outback Queensland helicopter crash
snippet.content: A 40-year-old man has died in a helicopter crash in outback Queensland, with emergency services yet to confirm if a second person is on board. It came down about 7:00am, with smoke sighted about 20 kilometres from Cloncurry. No other injuries are confirmed, but emergency crews are at the scene. The Mount Isa Lifeflight rescue helicopter was also sent to the scene a short time ago.
